content: This article is a load of crap as large as the Death Star. There isn’t a damned thing anyone can learn from Star Wars that means anything to leading a better life, and quoting that old crank Noam Chomsky was a dead giveaway to lunacy. Bush and his pals didn’t have the “strategery” to handle a small part of the Middle East, much less a galazy, and George Lucas and company can barely handle their personal lives.
